attributes.action: Change the Employment status of MPs and introduce a strong Code of Conduct .
attributes.additional_details:
Recent Governments and Political parties continue to be mired in controversy and this behaviour in some ways denies us a functioning democracy.
MPs refusing to clearly answer questions denies the electorate scrutiny.
The recent stamp duty case and the appointment of the UK ambassador to the US are among 2 of the latest scandals.
 Police officers would have been sacked  we see politicians act without honesty and integrity and face far less  sanctions. Take the inestigations away from politics
attributes.background: Change the employment status of MPs which protects them from bad behaviour and introduce a Code of Conduct with a range of sanctions. Politicians are not capable of "policing" themselves and behaviour which shows a lack of integrity is not taken seriously.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You may also which to sign these petitions relating to the conduct of MPs:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732555
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/731105
